rows.label: qst501805_msg0001
rows.name:
Me supposed to be giving Tome of
Mors to some strange Blade.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0002
rows.name: Blade is friend of yours?

rows.label: qst501805_msg0003
rows.name:
Pleasure to meet you.
Me name of Krezzi Temtem.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0004
rows.name:
People always tell me is strange name
for Nopon, but me quite fond of its
unusual flavor.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0005
rows.name:
Anyway, me sent letter to strange
Blade, but have no intention of
handing over Tome for free.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0006
rows.name:
Krezzi is greatest collector of unusual
items in all Luxuria. Only willing to trade
for other rare and interesting item!

rows.label: qst501805_msg0007
rows.name:
When judging rare and unusual items,
me always quantify exact numerical
Excitement Quotient.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0008
rows.name:
This because Krezzi only desire items
that make heart go pitter-pat and leap
with excitement!

rows.label: qst501805_msg0009
rows.name:
So yes. Friends bring items with
Excitement Quotient exceeding 100.
Then we trade.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0010
rows.name:
Friends bring items with Excitement
Quotient exceeding 100 yet?

rows.label: qst501805_msg0011
rows.name:
Krezzi warn friends, me very
connoisseur of unusual items.
Not excite for just any old thing.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0012
rows.name:
Oh dear, oh dear.
This no good at all.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0013
rows.name:
Friends must bring most very
incredible item, likes of which
Krezzi has never seen!

rows.label: qst501805_msg0014
rows.name: O-oh my wings! How eccentric!

rows.label: qst501805_msg0015
rows.name:
Me has never seen such avant-garde
combination! Such artistic innovation!
Impact takes breath away!

rows.label: qst501805_msg0016
rows.name:
Whew... Heart of Krezzi went pitter-pat
and loop-the-loop all right.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0017
rows.name:
Me go home right away, mount this
next to fireplace, and call all friends
round to admire!

rows.label: qst501805_msg0018
rows.name:
Here is promised item in exchange.
One Tome of Mors.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0019
rows.name:
Krezzi was going to collect all Tomes
by self, but hear strange Blade already
have three, so better to hand over.

rows.label: qst501805_msg0020
rows.name:
Hoping strange Blade have plenty
of luck deciphering Tomes!
